author: Awesome AnDrEw
content: I would really like to attend, but lack the necessary funding and vacation time at this point. Perhaps next year I will get around to it.

author: Matt Presson
content: If you are offering to pay I am located in Tennessee in the States.

author: Jen Cann
content: I love vegas, that picture of the sign says a thousand words. There is no place like Las Vegas anywhere else in the world.
